website_summaries.verdict: This lotion from a cult favorite French brand provides a light shea butter moisturizer for hands and nails.
pros: Delicately scented and provides a luxurious feel
cons: Somewhat pricey for what you get

customer_reviews.title: Lovely-Moisturizing Cream
customer_reviews.text: This cream is lovely! I really love the verbena scent and the way it moisturizes my hands. It leaves my hands very moisturized, yet not greasy at all. The moisture lasts and I can tell a difference when I use it. I just bought this as a gift for a friend as it is not overpriced as some creams are and it comes in nice package. The box is pretty and I love the metal tube it comes in as well. It kind of has an old fashioned flair but is so modern with it's natural ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comparison between L'Occitane and Pre de Provence Hand creams
customer_reviews.text: I had been using L'Occitane 20% Shea butter, which is quite expensive so I thought I'd try the Pre de Provence hand cream. I have Raynaud's Syndrome so my fingertips are always cracked and dry. The Pre de Provence cream at half the price, was almost as good as the L'Occitane. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nirnie

customer_reviews.title: Great non greasy cream
customer_reviews.text: Great cream ! I was looking for a replacement since my old favorite is no longer made. I wash my hands a ton all day every day and was looking for something that stuck around but wasn't heavy or greasy. This does the job ! I am in the restaurant business so probably wash my hands 30 plus times during the day at work alone so between cold weather and constant washing I needed a good cream. This provides a nice softening and keeps my hands from cracking. Will be purchasing again.Pleasant light fragrance that so subtle it just smells fresh herbs.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Schramm

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the scent of this lotion. I am not a hand lotion type of person at all (and my ragged cuticles prove it). However i apply the lotion nightly because it gives me a reason to smell it. It can be a little greasy if you use too much, but my hands look and feel so much smoother after using this for even just a week.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: It softens my rough skin.  Wonderful herbal smell.
customer_reviews.text: I use my hands everyday at a clinic, and my hands get dry after washing too frequently. This product moisturizes my hands very deeply without making them greasy. Its herbal smell is very elegant, and my patients who notice the smell seem to like it. The only downside is the cap. Its oddly small and very difficult to handle, especially once my finger gets slippery with lotion. I drop the cap on the floor very often.
customer_reviews.author: Ganymede

customer_reviews.title: Contains shea oil. Pricey.
customer_reviews.text: $8.5 for 1 oz, that's slightly more expensive compared to L'Occitane. I prefer the latter. This one is slightly greasy compared to L'Occitane, probably because it contains some amount of shea oil, and that was probably necessary because they needed to make the product more pliable since it is dispensed from a tube.
customer_reviews.author: RYWTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive individuals and dry skin
customer_reviews.text: This Shea butter has the best smell compared to most other Shea butters I have tried. It's very neutral and spreads and absorbs easily. I love this product and my sensitive skin and senses do to!
customer_reviews.author: Graceful_Pandora

customer_reviews.title: Verbena
customer_reviews.text: I have had the original and I love how moisturizing this hand cream is. I work in the medical field so I wash my hands like 20 times a day, at least. However, the original has a smell mixed between baby powder and grandma's perfume. I bought the Verbena this time and it has a very subtle scent but it is somewhat citronella or lemongrass. I don't mind it though. It smells fresh and clean. I will be trying lavender next time.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Greasy, lard consistency
customer_reviews.text: This was not what I was expecting at all. Hard to get out of the tube, had the look and feel of lard. Super greasy and would not absorb into my hands. Returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Carr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome handcream
customer_reviews.text: I think this has to be the best hand cream out there. I use it every day, sometimes, several times, massaging it in while watching TV. My manicurist asked me if I was doing something different because my cuticles were so nice and my hands also. Kind of pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hendy

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and would make a nice gift, but a little pricey for quantity and less emollient than would like
customer_reviews.text: This product smells great and sinks in quickly, so it doesn't get on things too badly. However, I can't give 5 stars because it seems really expensive for the quantity received. More importantly, I don't find this product any more emollient than my regular Curel body lotion from the drug store, and it doesn't noticeably soften my feet. So for the price, probably not worth it for every day use, but this would make a very nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Price is reasonable
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite soap. It is smooth , creamy, and leaves your skin hydrated and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Della

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Average soap. Felt like it was cheaply made. Not moisturizing at all. There was no smell.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of a linen/fresh/powdery scent. The bar lasted months. Liked it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Deanne

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent but it works
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this often and I can say that it does work to make your hands feel moisturized. The only thing is that the scent is very strong citrus scent. Sometimes it does give me a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Jan3t

customer_reviews.title: It's work
customer_reviews.text: It is work getting this stuff it of the tube. (It's available in a tin.) It is work rubbing it into a state more pliant and usable -- the warmth of your hands helps. Once on, it feels more like a coating. Lasting benefits? For some. This company used to make a fragrant, 20% Shea butter cream. I wish it still did.
customer_reviews.author: Still St. Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Great soap
customer_reviews.text: A creamy soap that cleanses and moisturizes. What more do you want?
customer_reviews.author: Susan from Tampa Bay

customer_reviews.title: My hands were cracking like crazy, especially when I went to cold climate ...
customer_reviews.text: My hands were cracking like crazy, especially when I went to cold climate areas in the winter. My hands would be the first to dry out. This lotion helped with damage after I came back home. Now my hands feel so smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my dad
customer_reviews.text: He likes it and says his dry skin is feeling much better. So he is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: No other foot cream compares!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best foot cream out there. After buying several less expensive, I found myself coming back to this brand. I am not even done with the one I have and have already bought a backup. I never want to go without again!! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Bitterlich

customer_reviews.title: 100% moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin due to chemo, and found this product to be extremely helpful! 1 oz is perfect for travelling.
customer_reviews.author: elaine

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I’m still using it and will buy again when I’m all out!
customer_reviews.author: 777J

customer_reviews.title: Lovely moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer with a lovely scent that is not overpowering
customer_reviews.author: Leslie I

customer_reviews.title: It is the best by far hand lotion and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I found this product at my regular day spa and have been using it for over 2 years. It is the best by far hand lotion and worth every penny. It immediately softens hands with no greasy residue and has a pleasant light fragrance. I swear my this product as my must haves.
customer_reviews.author: My

customer_reviews.title: Love this hand cream
customer_reviews.text: Love this hand cream! A bit pricey. I found it locally in a store at half the price :( . Wonderful soft smell that's not overpowering. Creamy and non greasy. I will definitely purchase more but at a cheaper price than online offers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturiser
customer_reviews.text: Great mosituriser at a good price. I use mostly on my lips & works well!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: This works just as well as the more expensive brand, and it smells so good! It's a little greasy, but it's hard to find a moisturizing hand cream that isn't. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Liked it enough to start a subscribe and save for it
customer_reviews.author: ifsogirl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good foot cream, good scent, not a large tube for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SL60

customer_reviews.title: I bought Pre De Provence Verbena Shea Butter Dry Skin ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought Pre De Provence Verbena Shea Butter Dry Skin Hand Cream (2.5 oz) after reading the reviews stating this hand cream was not greasy. Each time I used this hand cream it left my hands greasy, so I ended up tossing it. $15 dollar tube and all.
customer_reviews.author: shelby wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great for my purse
customer_reviews.text: I keep a tube of this in my bag for work - it's a great lotion that can be used yearround and the Verbena smell is fresh but not overpowering. The tube is made out of alumnimum (or some lightweight malleable metal) which I appreciate because it doesn't leak in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Lhcd3856

customer_reviews.title: It just feels like it evaporates away
customer_reviews.text: Kind of watery. It just feels like it evaporates away. Scent is too overpowering, I thought it would smell soft and naturally sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: First time I've used this product...it gives a Very nice sheen to my skin (without being greasy). This is also my first time using this scent. The scent is heavenly just wish it was stronger and would last longer. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KokoMe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Truly repairs your hands. Hands dry and cracking must order.
customer_reviews.author: K . J .

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Hand and body cream.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Pre de Provence lotions for years and this particular 20% cream verbena is my favorite! I find that at $10.00 on Amazon the price is more than fair for this exceptional quality.
customer_reviews.author: techie mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Hand Cream but...
customer_reviews.text: The hand cream is great but I didn't care for the fragrance. Verbena is not my favorite scent by a long shot. But the hand cream is wonderful. I'll use up the tube and get another fragrance next time.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis R.

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for my hands.
customer_reviews.text: I guess I have fairly dry skin in general, but I felt like it was really aging my hands, so I bought this lotion to keep in my desk at work (where I use chalk all day). After about a week of daily use my hands look and feel much softer (someone even complimented me on the softness of my hands!). I now use it only when my hands feel dry, but my skin looks and feel healthier even without daily use. The lemon verbena smell is also amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Cinelli

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. Non greasy, moisturizes well. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: iT IS OK.
customer_reviews.text: Reading a lots of good reviews and think to give a trial. It is ok. I was not super impressed. However, as long as it is natural, I am fine with it.
customer_reviews.author: GWOODSONG

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing! My skin feels smooth and refreshed
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing! My skin feels smooth and refreshed! I will definitely be a returned customer. Fast shipping to, which it's a plus for me. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Long time user of this product
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this Pre de Provence product for at least 6 years and am very satisfied. Regimen for me is using a pumice stone everyday followed with this foot cream. Great results.
customer_reviews.author: BeaPenn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Long-Lasting Hand Cream; Smells Great!
customer_reviews.text: This hand cream has a nice, delicate scent. You only need to use a small amount, so it last a long time. It lasts quite awhile between applications. It comes in two other scents, but my favorite is the Verbena.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Obrien

customer_reviews.title: It smells great and is comparable to Loccitane
customer_reviews.text: It moisturizes well, but leaves your hands a bit greasy for a few minutes. It smells great and is comparable to Loccitane.
customer_reviews.author: LoPan

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this hand cream. The smell is a light citrus and the cream makes my hands feel soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Love amazon shopping

customer_reviews.title: Love Pre de Provence EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a longtime fan of Pre de Provence, and their hand creams are no exception! Great smelling, rich and long lasting! They are all about quality products.
customer_reviews.author: A S

customer_reviews.title: lovely true scent and very thick and nice.
customer_reviews.text: gorgeous scent, not cheap and chemically. Love the creamy consistency. Not a light watery lotion, but a thicker cream. love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for years and have found it to be an amazing healer for minor skin issues. Don't know why, but it does work. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Bronco Man

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, refreshing scented hand cream with shea butter for moisturizing dry hands. I carry this one in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best soap in the world. good service from seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for years. It's the best thing for dry skin and winter hand protector. Pure Shea butter.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: This lotion smells different than the lotion I had previously of the same brand/scent
customer_reviews.text: I was given this lotion as a gift and liked it so much that, when I ran out of it, I wanted to purchase it for myself. The product I received, however, does not have the same scent as the one I had previously. I actually don't like the scent of this lotion much at all. The lotion works well, but based on the scent I would not purchase this particular item again.
customer_reviews.author: JenJen

customer_reviews.title: excellent shea hand cream
customer_reviews.text: excellent shea hand cream, it is the best cream i have ever use.i love it, lets my hands very soft
customer_reviews.author: Nora Cecilia Ruz Esteves

customer_reviews.title: Super hand cream
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in my purse. I use hand cream all the time due to dry skin. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you like your feet you will like this supper soft feet!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Pat's revirew
customer_reviews.text: I love the soap and have been using this for years. I'm having a hard time buying it as I use to get it from Bonsavon but I think they are no longer in business.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best foot cream out there. Shea and peppermint. Easy to massage into skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Hand cream
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hand cream I've ever found. Love the fragrance and the coverage and staying power, especially in cold winter weather.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Depue

customer_reviews.title: Convenience Plus
customer_reviews.text: Pre de Provence 100 percent Shea Butter unscented hand cream already makes the best hand cream and now with the 1 ounce tubes to stick in your purse or pocket it is ultra convenient to have at all times. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Verbena rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of verbena -- so French ! Great hand cream -- one of the best I have every used.
customer_reviews.author: Frenchrunner

customer_reviews.title: great quality, non-greasy lotion
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a gift, then bought more when I ran out, then bought more to give as gifts. Lovely size and fragrance, great quality, non-greasy lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Ami P. Bass

customer_reviews.title: super!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for an excellent hand cream that smells wonderful! I'd order again, especially for this price. Arrived quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Pre de Provence
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product for dry climates! It penetrates gently and does not have a strong smell. Goes on gently and evenly
customer_reviews.author: MAK306

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not disappointed!! Just as wonderful as it's counterpart
customer_reviews.text: First time I've tried the Pre de Provence for feet. Definitely not disappointed!! Just as wonderful as it's counterpart, Pre de Provence Natural, Repairing, Dry Skin Hand Cream 20% Shea Butter.
customer_reviews.author: Renee T

customer_reviews.title: gross...
customer_reviews.text: this was horrible!!! It smelled and felt like pure grease on my hands!! I threw it out. Perhaps I got a bad tube because I love their lavender hand cream as well as use their aragon oil one...which is nice but not great although I still use it. This one was just gross in every sense!!!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hand cream
customer_reviews.text: Pre de Provence is one of the best hand creams I've ever used. Being in the midwest, winter can be very drying, and this helps so much. Never disappointed with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Casbarr

customer_reviews.title: Simply The Best I Have Tried
customer_reviews.text: This hand cream is amazing! I got a 2oz tube and fell in love with it the first time I used it. Yes, the scent is great, but there are many lotions and creams that smell nice. What I love is how it feels and makes my hands feel. I did not experience the usual greasy feeling that I normally do with other hand creams. It absorbed very well! My hands are so soft and even feel that way after a good washing!
customer_reviews.author: Jskell911

customer_reviews.title: I keep up the search for the perfect hand cream--haven't found it yet
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many hand creams... the lavender Pre de Provence is more moisturizing than this one. This was a disappointment. Although I don't live in a dry climate, my hands are very dried from washing and this doesn't work as a night repair cream.
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Very good! It can be a very good repair cracking ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good!It can be a very good repair cracking of my hand!
customer_reviews.author: Luoying

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what Shea Butter is, chemically, but it is outstanding stuff and well worth the expense. Do buy it if you are having cracking fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Songbird

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I thought it was
customer_reviews.text: I bought L'occitane shea butter hand cream over Christmas and love it. This product is billed to be the same as their hand cream but hands down isn't. The scent smells awkward and the lotion doesn't have the same consistency as the L'occitane product. I will not buy this again. I really should return it as I don't think I can tolerate the smell!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Williams

customer_reviews.title: Smells like lemon candy (not in a good way
customer_reviews.text: Smells like lemon candy (not in a good way, either) and doesn't work any better or worse than the Nivea I can buy at Target for 1/10 of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rug buyer

customer_reviews.title: ... mancurist an this is one of the few really good creams on the market that really
customer_reviews.text: I am a mancurist an this is one of the few really good creams on the market that really,really works.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Boyd

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This was suppose to be a gift. The box is totally destroyed! I cannot give this to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Light Scent
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet, but after unwrapping, it appears to be a good quality soap. Lavender is my favorite, so I'm already hooked.
customer_reviews.author: A. Garner

customer_reviews.title: HUGE bar-smells clean and calming
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how large this bar of soap is. I've set it up for Subscribe & Save, and think I will try to cut it in half from now on. It's hard to hold onto while you wait for it to get smaller. I don't like overpowering or flowery scents. This is not either of those. It smells clean, and it makes me calm when I inhale the scent. I walk into my bathroom, and there is a light scent in the air. It makes my skin feel good. I also use it on my face. It's kinda amazing.
customer_reviews.author: B. R. Stearns

customer_reviews.title: ORIGINAL 20% Shea Butter is wonderfully soothing and moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: I truly LOVE Pre de Provence and this luxuriously enriched ORIGINAL 20% Shea Butter soap is divine. No noticeable scent, just rich creamy elegance! I highly recommend this soap in particular, because many of their other soaps are now made with vegetable oil. This is the REAL thing, the ORIGINAL! I got out of my bath feeling I had just moisturized my legs, they were so silky soft. I think you'll LOVE this, especially if you don't care for heavily scented bath products. and prefer the luxury of 20% Shea Butter, instead. I hope this was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Great CookTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Indeed Fragrance Free, but waxy feel.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with this cream. I love shea butter hand cream because of their healing properties. I have allergies and it's very hard to find unscented hand creams. This cream is 100% shea butter, but it's the strangest shea butter hand cream I've ever used. It feels like it's loaded with paraffin (it's not). Even when warmed up, it still has a waxy, occlusive feel. I've been using it for a week+, but see none of the usual results that I've experienced with other shea creams. It's not for me. Can't recommend; wouldn't repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: yellow95

customer_reviews.title: Not for busy moms.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful creamy soap, but is probably best as a hand soap, unless you use a bath sponge or a facecloth in the bath or shower (hence the 4 star rating). It is a bit large and far too hard and sharp-edged to use directly on your body, and because of its creaminess, it takes longer to wash off. As a mom of three, I don't have time for such luxuries, and it felt like I was washing my body with the handle of a shoe brush (though my skin felt and smelled lovely). Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Anna671

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: This is okay soap and does what it's made for, but doesn't have much of a smell to give you that just showered feeling. Maybe better as a hand soap. It does lather well and doesn't strip the skin of moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Embeolda

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, not greasy
customer_reviews.text: This stuff feels wonderful! I am very picky about my hand lotion and hate lotion that feels the least bit greasy. This is the best lotion I've felt, and I have certainly sampled a lot of lotions. My son loves it too. The verbena has a fairly pronounced but pleasant lemon smell. I'm also sensitive to smells and do wish I could have gotten this 20% shea in unscented, but it wasn't available. For this lotion I am willing to deal with more scent than I would like.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonKC

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly smell and feel!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the Verbena smell and my hands always feel so refreshed after using this great hand cream.
customer_reviews.author: BJKK

customer_reviews.title: Your feet will love you!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the first time I've purchased this shea butter for my feet... it is an outstanding product..
customer_reviews.author: realtyagent

customer_reviews.title: Best soap ever!
customer_reviews.text: The best soap in the world! I give my highest recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: nicdel85

customer_reviews.title: Fresh scent, soothing cream
customer_reviews.text: Scent: Verbena. I love the light, fresh scent and the smooth, soothing cream. After a couple of minutes, there is no residue, and a little goes a long way. Expensive but very good.
customer_reviews.author: Fairlight Reader

customer_reviews.title: Fairly effective but greasy, and very overwhelming smell
customer_reviews.text: It works fairly well, however it also leaves my skin fairly greasy and sticky which I'm not wild about because the grease can stain clothes. The biggest part I am not wild about it though is the overwhelming smell- it's really strong, and I don't have a great sense of smell.
customer_reviews.author: april w.

customer_reviews.title: Part of a great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I selected a few items that I enjoy to share with my daughter in law, since I knew that family was not able to come home to our house for Christmas. I like this product for what it is, a minty moisturizer. I am not sure if Amazon carries Bar Maids Lo Lo O' for feet--I like that product a little better because it is like a moisturizer stick in a deodorant container--goes on without getting it on your hands--but this is a very close second.
customer_reviews.author: S. Durston

customer_reviews.title: Not like it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this product, have been using it for 15 years, but it is time to find a replacement. The latest tin I received had a nasty rancid smell, and it is no longer the thick, creamy product it was in years past. It now has a grainy, thinner consistency. What a shame because it used to be great.
customer_reviews.author: Avanti J

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. It was not as greasy as I would have thought it to be considering that it is 100% shea butter. I love that it virtually has NO SMELL once applied. Also, you don't need to apply a large amount to get the job done. Overall I am very satisfied with this purchase and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: B_Alfaro

customer_reviews.title: Peppermint scented!
customer_reviews.text: This foot cream is amazing! I love the peppermint in it. Cooling and smells Devine. Wish it was a little less expensive for the size you get but I really do love it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana S. Abel

customer_reviews.title: I loved that it was all natural
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for my Grandmother she lives in a cold dry area and her hands crack. She says the cracks have healed and it smells delightful. I loved that it was all natural. And Safe for her sensitive skin. Would highly recommend this product to friends and even a stranger in the grocery store looking at lotion for dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: audra huffmaster

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use at the gym. The lavender feels good on the muscles after working out. Also, after getting out of the pool water, the high amount of shea butter in this bar is very moisturizing. Although I have trouble with 'artificially scented' products, the natural lavender oil in this soap has not been a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Auberry

customer_reviews.title: A good emollient
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been using this for years. It's especially good to have it on hand in summer when daily dunks in chlorine water dry out my skin so bad. If your hands, feet, arms or legs need serious help, this might do it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa E. Oneill

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing stuff...no other cream compares!
customer_reviews.text: My super dry hands are so happy I found this product and I will purchase it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Raca

customer_reviews.title: I love shea butter but this was just a little too ...
customer_reviews.text: I love shea butter but this was just a little too greasy. Left my hand feeling nice after I dabbed them off.
customer_reviews.author: Julia.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: Used soap for 13 years moisturizing for even cold climates Love this soap
customer_reviews.author: lisa Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff ever for dry hands and feet!!! I’m so happy to have found it in a small travel size.
customer_reviews.author: LKA

customer_reviews.title: Not L'Occitane
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this cream because it sounded very similar to the L'Ocittane 20% shea lotion that I use and love but came in a bigger size (2.5oz vs 1oz) and was cheaper. Bad decision. Used it once and my hands started itching. I'm still a little itchy, 3 days later. The verbena scent was a little bit overwhelming too, not mild as mentioned in other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Olga P.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product - have used for years. Take a little, let it kind of melt, and rub it in! Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Vivkid

customer_reviews.title: Way over priced
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the premium price. There are drug store lotion that work much better.
customer_reviews.author: Enjae434

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brand. Best hand cream out there
customer_reviews.text: Awesome brand. Best hand cream out there. Makes a fabulous gift too.
customer_reviews.author: ChaCha Dodds

product_meta.title: Pre de Provence 100% Natural Shea Butter Dry Skin Treatment, For Repairing, Soothing, Moisturizing - Unscented (1 oz)
product_meta.description: In central Africa, the karite tree flourishes remarkably amid harsh, arid conditions. Sometimes called the "tree of life" for its many beneficial uses, it yields a nut containing the natural fat, shea butter. One of nature's most effective moisturizer, shea butter is ultra rich yet gentle, providing deep healing, moisturizing and protection of skin, hair, cuticles and lips. As a pure oil, this rich, emollient treatment is perfect for quenching dry skin and a little bit goes a long way! It's only greasy if you use too much. To view more of our products search: Pre de Provence or visit our brand page at amazon.com/predeprovence.
feature_bullets: BENEFITS OF SHEA BUTTER - Shea Butter is one of natures most effective moisturizers - ultra rich, yet gentle, providing deep healing, moisturization and protection of skin, hair, cuticles and lips
HOW TO APPLY - Melt a small amount in palm of hands before applying to face, hands, body and hair
GIVE SKIN SOME EXTRA HELP - Assists in restoring & maintaining skin elasticity and tone while fighting dry skin
NO ANIMAL TESTING - Free of Parabens, Ethyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, DEA
DISCOVER FRENCH ARTISANAL SKINCARE AND BATH PRODUCTS - Click the Pre de Provence link at the top of the page to explore more natural and gentle products
